In general on the board there are several *Thematics*, each thematic contains *Threads* to a specific "topic".

A *Thread* contains several *entries* and *related threads*

an *Entry* contains an *author*, *date* and *text*

###Thematic

- Thread
- Thread
- Thread
  
###Thread

- entry
- entry
- ....
  
- related
  - thread
  - thread
  - thread

###entry

- author
- date
- text
  * links
  * references
  * etc...
